description.narrative: The project development objective is to increase the availability and access to finance for micro, small, and medium enterprises through eligible financial intermediaries with the support of a new wholesale development finance institution.

condition.narrative: Credit Guarantee Facility (CGF) Entity | Description :No later than twelve (12) months, after Project Restructuring, theDevelopment Bank of Nigeria shall establish a CGF Entity, in form and substance and with resources satisfactory to the Bank, forthe purpose of providing Partial Credit Guarantee to PFIs on their Sub-loans to Eligible Beneficiaries

Finance Agreement :DFI Board Observer Status | Description :Without limitation to the provision of Article V of the GeneralConditions, the Borrower shall enable the Bank's representatives to participate as observers on the DFI Board under the terms setforth in the Project Operations Manual.

Finance Agreement :Financial Management Covenants | Description :Not later than 90 days after the Effective Date, the Borrowershall: (a) appoint the independent auditors referred to in Section 5.09 (b) of the General Conditions, in accordance with theprovisions of Section III of Schedule 2; (b) update its computerized accounting systems to incorporate Project activities,satisfactory to the Bank; and (c) train its internal auditor on risk-based internal audit | Due Date :26-Apr-2015

Finance Agreement :Procurement Complaint Mechanism | Description :The Borrower shall, not later than ninety (90) days after theEffective Date, establish a procurement complaint mechanism comprising an online database or a complaint hotline, in form andsubstance satisfactory to the Bank. | Due Date :26-Apr-2015

Not later than 12 months after Project Restructuring, the CGF Entity will adopt a guarantee manual, satisfactory to the Bank,addressing: eligibility criteria for potential beneficiaries; detailed conditions to be met by potential CGF beneficiaries;mechanisms for delivery of the Partial Credit Guarantees; environmental and social risk management; and M&E system, including howto audit the CGF

To verify the achievement of DLIs under tranches IV, V and VI, the Development Bank of Nigeria shall employ a verification agent,acceptable to the Bank; and prior to each disbursement of Loan proceeds ensure that the verification agent has verified achievementof the respective DLIs, satisfactory to the Bank.

title.narrative: PFIs' Eligible Sub-loan Portfolio Quality (Non-Performing Loans)
Volume of PFIs' Eligible Sub-Loans facilitated by Line of Credit Facility
Volume of PFIs' Eligible Sub-Loans facilitated by CGF
Number of PFIs reporting on lending to women sub-borrowers
